blogPost.excerpt: Fancy Widget is the ultimate widget App that can make your iPhone home screen look stunning. It starts with a wide collection of beautiful designed widgets, which range in function from clock, to weather, to calendar and step counting.
blogPost.body: Fancy Widget is the ultimate widget App that can make your iPhone home screen look stunning. It starts with a wide collection of beautiful designed widgets, which range in function from clock, to weather, to calendar and step counting.
blogPost.title: Fancy Widget - Create fancy widgets on iOS
blogPost.author: Joshua Jian

localize.description: Fancy Widget是一款终极的小部件App，它可以让你的iPhone主屏幕看起来很惊艳。它拥有一系列设计精美的小部件，功能从时钟、天气、日历到计步等。
localize.tagline: 在iOS上创建花哨的小部件

localize.description: Fancy Widget是一款終極的小部件App，它可以讓你的iPhone主屏幕看起來很驚豔。它擁有一系列設計精美的小部件，功能從時鐘、天氣、日曆到計步等。
localize.tagline: 在iOS上創建花哨的小部件

previous.excerpt: The Collections database consists of entries for more than 480,000 works in the Musée du Louvre and Musée National Eugène-Delacroix. Updated on a daily basis, it is the result of the continuous research and documentation efforts carried out by both museums.
previous.title: Louvre Museum Online - Explore the entirety of the Louvre's collection for free

localize.description: 藏品数据库包括卢浮宫博物馆和欧仁-德拉克洛瓦国家博物馆480,000多件作品的条目。该数据库每天更新，是两个博物馆不断进行研究和文献工作的结果。
localize.tagline: 免费探索卢浮宫的全部藏品。

localize.description: 藏品數據庫包括盧浮宮博物館和歐仁-德拉克洛瓦國家博物館480,000多件作品的條目。該數據庫每天更新，是兩個博物館不斷進行研究和文獻工作的結果。
localize.tagline: 免費探索盧浮宮的全部藏品。

next.excerpt: API Connector is simple solution for data importing from any JSON API to Google Sheet, Airtable, & Webflow.
next.title: API Connector - Import JSON data into Google Sheet, Airtable, & Webflow

localize.description: API Connector是一个简单的解决方案，可以从任何JSON API导入数据到Google Sheet, Airtable, & Webflow。
localize.tagline: 将JSON数据导入到Google Sheet、Airtable和Webflow中。

localize.description: API Connector是一個簡單的解決方案，可以從任何JSON API導入數據到Google Sheet, Airtable, & Webflow。
localize.tagline: 將JSON數據導入到Google Sheet、Airtable和Webflow中。
